mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nume, u.prenume, u.idCompartiment, c.nume as compartiment, u.registrationDate FROM user_data u LEFT JOIN compartimente c on c.id = u.idCompartiment ORDER BY u.nume DESC

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nume, u.prenume, u.idCompartiment, c.nume as compartiment, u.registrationDate FROM user_data u LEFT JOIN compartimente c on c.id = u.idCompartiment WHERE u.username = #{username}
